hi all,

for example, in my JUnit test Case I have following:

  public int testAdd(int a, int b) {
  	return a + b;
  }
  
  public int testSubstract(int a, int b) {
  	return a - b;
  }  


for some reasons, now I want to exclude testSubstract when the 
test class is run, I'm only interested in testing testAdd.

is this possible in JUnit? if yes, can you please tell me how?

Thank you very much in advance.
dion.
d10n2002@...
